text: The 2017 Munster Under-25 Reserve Hurling Competition was the first staging of the Munster Under-25 Reserve Hurling Competition. The competition began on 4 June 2017 and ended on 18 June 2017. ==Teams== ===Participants=== Prior to the opening of the competition, the Cork and Tipperary teams withdrew. This resulted in just three teams remaining, with Waterford receiving a bye to the final. ===Individual details=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Team ! Colours ! Sponsor ! Captain !
